page.title: 01Gazeteer
page.content: Our Domesday area is a diverse one, ranging from the open parkland at {Temple Newsam}to the dense residential district of{Rothwell Haigh. The main atmosphere is that of an industrial region, with{Skelton Grange {power station}dominating the skyline for miles around. The{Yorkshire Copper {works, Knostrop}sewage treatment plant and other chemical and mining concerns, reinforce this strong impression. {Stourton}has decayed to the extent that the western part of the area has been demolished. It is currently wasteland. In the south, container parks and open wasteland combine with the unpretentious suburbs of northern {Rothwell}to provide a discordant landscape.
